examples.example: 这件商品的质量不错，价格还很便宜，真的是物超所值。

translate.english: The quality of this commodity is good, and the price is still very cheap. It is really a bargain.

examples.example: 这家超市经常有优惠活动，能买到很多便宜又好用的东西，真的很棒。

translate.english: This supermarket often has promotional activities, and many cheap and useful things can be bought, which is really great.

examples.example: 我在商场买到了一件既漂亮又便宜的衣服，太开心了。

translate.english: I bought a beautiful and cheap clothes in the mall, so happy.
